statements: SELECT * FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM employee_feedback WHERE collaboration_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback, collaboration_rating FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, feedback, collaboration_rating FROM employee_feedback ORDER BY collaboration_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE collaboration_rating < 2;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM employee_feedback ORDER BY collaboration_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE collaboration_rating > 3 AND employee_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT collaboration_rating, employee_id FROM employee_feedback WHERE collaboration_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY employee_id
SELECT MAX(collaboration_rating) AS highest_rating FROM employee_feedback
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, team_id FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM teams WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE team_id = 3 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, feedback FROM employees WHERE team_id = 4 AND employee_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, feedback FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM teams WHERE collaboration_score >= 8.0;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, team_name FROM employees e JOIN teams t ON e.team_id = t.team_id;
SELECT MAX(collaboration_score) AS highest_collaboration_score FROM teams;
SELECT * FROM team_collaboration_feedback;
SELECT team_id, employee_id, feedback_text FROM team_collaboration_feedback WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, employee_role FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_collaboration_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, team_id, feedback_text FROM team_collaboration_feedback WHERE team_id = 5;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, t.team_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN teams t ON e.employee_id = t.team_leader_id;
SELECT team_id, AVG(feedback_id) AS avg_feedback_id FROM team_collaboration_feedback GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT MAX(feedback_id) AS max_feedback_id, MIN(feedback_id) AS min_feedback_id FROM team_collaboration_feedback;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT emp_id, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT emp_name, email, phone_number FROM Employee WHERE emp_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Team WHERE team_leader_id = 4;
SELECT feedback_id, communication_rating, cooperation_rating FROM CollaborationRating WHERE rating_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT e.emp_name, e.email, t.team_name FROM Employee e INNER JOIN Team t ON e.emp_id = t.team_leader_id;
SELECT * FROM CollaborationRating WHERE communication_rating > 3 AND cooperation_rating < 5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE emp_id = 2 AND feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT e.emp_name, t.team_name FROM Employee e, Team t WHERE e.emp_id = t.team_leader_id AND t.team_name LIKE '%Development%';
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT collaboration_id, collaboration_date, collaboration_duration FROM collaboration WHERE collaboration_duration > 60;
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, evaluation_score FROM employee JOIN performance_evaluation ON employee.employee_id = performance_evaluation.employee_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(collaboration_id) AS num_collaborations FROM team JOIN collaboration ON team.team_id = collaboration.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT employee_name, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback JOIN employee ON employee_feedback.employee_id = employee.employee_id WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
